Description: Marketron is a leading provider of enterprise revenue and profitability management solutions for the media industry.
Name: Marketron

Methods.Name: List All Invoices
Methods.Description: List all invoices for a given company.

Methods.Name: List Updated Sales Data
Methods.Description: List all Sales Data for a given company that have been updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Invoices
Methods.Description: List updated invoices since last successful run for a given company.

Methods.Name: List Sales Data
Methods.Description: List all Sales Data for a given company.

Methods.Description: Get traffic sale type category details.

Methods.Description: List all sale types for a given company.

Methods.Description: List all sale types for a given company. Alternatively known as Inventory Type or Spot Type.

Methods.Description: List all sale type categories for a given company.

Methods.Description: List all sale types for a given company that have been updated since last run. Alternatively known as Inventory Type or Spot Type.

Methods.Description: List all sale type categories for a given company that have been updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Order
Methods.Description: Retrieve a specific order.

Methods.Description: List all clients for a given company, clients include Advertisers and Agencies.

Methods.Description: List all revenue sources for a given company.
